name: CLKTimeIntervalGaugeProvider
desc: A gauge that tracks time intervals.

items.name: init(style: CLKGaugeProviderStyle, gaugeColors: [UIColor]?, gaugeColorLocations: [NSNumber]?, start: Date, end: Date)
items.desc: Creates a time interval gauge that fills as time passes.

items.name: init(style: CLKGaugeProviderStyle, gaugeColors: [UIColor]?, gaugeColorLocations: [NSNumber]?, start: Date, startFillFraction: Float, end: Date, endFillFraction: Float)
items.desc: Creates a time interval gauge, letting you specify whether the gauge fills or empties as time passes.

items.name: var startDate: Date
items.desc: The starting time and date for the gauge’s time interval.

items.name: var endDate: Date
items.desc: The ending time and date for the gauge’s time interval.

items.name: var startFillFraction: Float
items.desc: The position of the leading edge of the time bar within the specified time interval.

items.name: var endFillFraction: Float
items.desc: The position of the trailing edge of the time bar within the specified time interval.
